summary: Feature request to include musl-based shared library in the TypeScript SDK package for better compatibility with musl-based Linux distributions (Alpine Linux containers).
userImpact: Users running the SDK in musl-based environments (like Alpine Linux) need native library binaries compatible with musl instead of glibc.
proposedFix: Include musl-based shared library variants in the npm package distribution.
keyQuote: Include musl-based shared library in package
